### Imports

```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(caret)
```

```{r}
df <- readRDS("../data/clean-data.rds")
head(df)
```

### Train-Test Split

```{r}
set.seed(42)

train_index <- createDataPartition(
  df$Adaptivity.Level,
  p = 0.8,
  list = FALSE,
  times = 1
)

train_set <- df[train_index, ]
test_set <- df[-train_index, ]
```

### Feature Selection

```{r}
x <- train_set %>% select(-Adaptivity.Level)
y <- train_set[, "Adaptivity.Level"]
```

#### Recursive Feature Elimination

```{r}
rfe_control <- rfeControl(
  functions = rfFuncs,
  method = "repeatedcv",
  number = 10,
  repeats = 10,
  verbose = FALSE
)
```

```{r}
set.seed(42)

rf_rfe <- rfe(x, y, sizes = 1:ncol(x) - 1, rfeControl = rfe_control)
rf_rfe
```

```{r}
plot(rf_rfe, type = c("g", "o"))
```

```{r}
predictors(rf_rfe)
```

```{r}
varImp(rf_rfe)
```

All variables are selected by RFE.

#### Genetic Algorithm

```{r}
ga_control <- gafsControl(
  functions = rfGA,
  method = "repeatedcv",
  number = 10,
  repeats = 10
)
```

```{r}
set.seed(42)

rf_ga <- gafs(x, y, gafsControl = ga_control)
rf_ga
```

```{r}
plot(rf_ga)
```

```{r}
ga_selected_variables <- rf_ga$optVariables
ga_selected_variables
```

Create train set and test set with selected variables from GA.

```{r}
train_set_ga <- train_set %>% 
  select(all_of(ga_selected_variables), Adaptivity.Level)

test_set_ga <- test_set %>% 
  select(all_of(ga_selected_variables), Adaptivity.Level)
```

### Exports

```{r}
saveRDS(train_set, "../data/train_set.rds")

saveRDS(test_set, "../data/test_set.rds")

saveRDS(train_set_ga, "../data/train_set_ga.rds")

saveRDS(test_set, "../data/test_set_ga.rds")
```
